item.title: Merry Christmas everyone!
item.description: This year I got a job in retail, I like it a lot since I'm a very talkative person ?. Beats making food lol. It's also my first holiday season in retail and boy was it busy! But I think I managed ok. I never thought I'd have the courage to have a public facing job given by surgeries and my facial scar, but (most) people are very nice here ? Sorry for rambling but I hope you all have a great rest of the holiday season and a new year ? ?

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @zorggalacticus made this hiking stick!
27 Man Tax: Cary Elwes
“Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds you plant.” - Robert Louis Stevenson I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!
item.dc:creator: MemeMuseumCurator

item.title: TheFreeChristmasDude
item.description:
Happy Holidays from TheFreePizzaDude! Let's make sure people have food for Xmas dinner. If you'd like to help a struggling Imgurian get groceries or a meal today there are 2 easy ways -
You can find a request for food in the comments, reply to them and then send a DM to get an order set up Or you can contribute to the Imgurian Meal Fund and we'll send the food for you!
Anonymous Angels have been such an amazong help for us to feed more people, we love you https://www.paypal.me/TheFreePizzaDude https://ko-fi.com/thefreepizzadude
And here's how you'd send it yourself! Any questions as an Angel? Just shoot us a message! We'll be on this username until 6pm central
Here's how it works for requests -
It's much easier for us to help requests in the US but we'll do our best to pick up requests from any country. Putting your country in your comment helps us match you to an Angel in your area
Any questions as a requestor? Just leave a comment! We'll have helpers on the post for 6 hours
This post is dedicated to my amazing father who sadly passed away this week. Thank you for everything dad. ... Today's Meal Tally 1230 1st by Pizza Angel @IMPICKLERICK 1245 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th by @OP 125 6th and 7th by Pizza Angel @pot314 145 8th, 9th, 10th and 11th by @OP 220 12th by Pizza Angel @Heyyzthisguy 245 13th and 14th by Pizza Angel @pot314 315 15th and 16th by Pizza Angel @rawrberry 415 17th, 18th, 19th and 20th by @OP 440 21st by Pizza Angel @Toledontohinope 455 22nd, Michael Jordan, Kobe Bryant and 25th by Pizza Angel @pot314 500 26th, 27th, 28th and 29th by @OP 518 30th and 31st by Pizza Angel @letsgototheoldfolkshome ... Today's Grocery Tally 102 1st by Grocery Angel @pot314 230 2nd by Grocery Angel @pot314 600 3rd by Grocery Angel @pot34

item.title: Potato's Daily Dirties
item.description:
being a problem recently. it fun. figured people could use some memes today.. or just wanna touchie someone elses post on the front page... uwu.
...
...
mhmm
The above image was made by the wonderful CammyJay! They have their own channel in the deviousness discord where they share artwork and sometimes do drawings based on word prompts given by members. its a lot of fun! I has a Deviousness discord server! I caugh a @ShaggyRootsAgain er om. invited them to have a channel where they dump memes now in there. is fun. We do have a hard rule of no politics and/or religion. The discord is a safe space to get away from the bullshit going on. We have a bunch of areas including a SFW area, content creator area, a NSFW area and more! We have gaming fun! We have spontaneous gaming and some ping roles for people to use to get groups together based on US and EU time zones! We have movie nights on Saturdays! So feel free to wander in and say haii! Thank you to everyone who has joined and made it such a unique and special place! Deviousness discord that is 18+: https://discord.gg/deviousness If you have issues with link see dis: https://imgur.com/a/8GUNAz4 Deviousness steam group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/DeviousnessDiscord
artist of work above (aside from my signing potato on it): https://florahv.artstation.com/projects/XnL8P3 I am on dis now and trying to remember to linky over there too for when I post and also post the memes that get removed: https://bsky.app/profile/potatocheesmonk.bsky.social I has a post with links to all my past posts. enjoy: https://imgur.com/a/ZDA2CBe #deliciousness #potato #memes #dailydirties

item.title: Check out my Christmas Etch A Sketches!
item.description: Video uploading is back! It's a Christmas miracle! Oh how happy I am to share videos with you again - I've got another one in my back pocket that I'll share before the new year :) It brings me so much joy to share my esoteric collections and career with you all here on Imgur. This Christmas I bask in gratitude for the delightful support you all have given me - be it through upvoting, leaving clever comments, making react images out of closeups of my stranger facial expressions (you know who you are, lol), or even showing up IRL on the rare occasion when my career sends me off on random adventures. It's supporters like you that keep my career kicking! This June will mark TEN YEARS of Etch A Sketch being my full-time gig. The internet was a very different place in 2016. I've had to adapt a lot to keep afloat, and am thankful that I've found a lovely community here. Thank you all, and to all a good night!
item.dc:creator: pikajane

One of those pitties who cannot control themselves and will maul you with love

Both rescues who opened their hearts to each other and their humans. May we all be so brave, and may your hope be answered with love and healing this new year
